comment.author: 23302438@N03
comment._content: Again, according to the historical society the shops were at 40th St., not Proviso. So the caption seems to be correct, but the note accompanying the picture is not.

comment.author: 23302438@N03
comment._content: Also, subject would be Chicago, not Melrose Park.
